definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: It is possible that you inadvertently took an excessive dose of an over-the-counter preparation.
sentences.chinese: 有可能是你把非处方药吃过量了。

sentences.english: The State adopts a system of classified management for prescription and non-prescription drugs.
sentences.chinese: 国家对药品实行处方药与非处方药分类管理制度。

sentences.english: The FDA said over-the-counter drugs remain safe and effective when used as directed.
sentences.chinese: FDA说，在指导下使用非处方药仍然是安全有效的。

sentences.english: Some over-the-counter drugs can help alleviate your sinus problems.
sentences.chinese: 一些非处方药能够减轻你的鼻炎。

sentences.english: The injections and nonprescription pharmaceuticals shall, in addition, list the names of all supplementary materials in use.
sentences.chinese: 注射剂和非处方药还应当列出所用的全部辅料名称。

sentences.english: One side effect of taking many prescription and over-the-counter drugs can be a worrisome increase in memory lapses.
sentences.chinese: 处方药和非处方药的副作用之一就是记忆力衰退。

sentences.english: Have some over-the-counter (OTC) remedies on hand for when symptoms strike.
sentences.chinese: 准备一些非处方药物应对症状的出现。

sentences.english: In the U. S. and many other countries, KI is a non-prescription, over-the-counter drug.
sentences.chinese: 在美国同其他许多国家一样，碘片是一种非处方药。

sentences.english: The product is used as over-the-counter drug for subcalorism.
sentences.chinese: 本品为感冒用药类非处方药药品。

sentences.english: As for colds, the sooner a person starts taking over-the-counter remedies, the sooner relief will come.
sentences.chinese: 患者越早开始服用非处方药，感冒就好得越快。

sentences.english: D. A complete list of all prescription and nonprescription drugs should be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 一体系的处方药及非处方药必须给予。

sentences.english: The drug is available, although illegally, as an over-the-counter pill.
sentences.chinese: 这种药物被非法地做作为一种非处方药。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Shi2 pin3 Yao4 pin3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 ju2
related.word: 国家食品药品监督管理局

definition: Ibuprofen or Nurofen/also called 異丁苯丙酸|异丁苯丙酸
